channel.title: Jokes
channel.description:
Three blondes are stuck on a desert island and one finds a magic lamp. They rub it and a genie pops out and gives them each a wish. the first blonde says, "I wish I was 10% smarter so I could get off of this island." Then she turns into a redhead and swims off the island. The second sees what happens and says "I wish I was 25% smarter so that I can get off this island!" She then turns into a brunette, makes a raft from trees and sails off. Finally, the third blonde says "I wish I was 50% smarter so I can get off this island." She then suddenly turns into a man and walks across the bridge. Hehehehehe :D :D :D
Cya -Ollie

item.title: Jokes
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

Ok so these three people found this genie bottle and are granted one wish each, the first guy goes “I wish all the niggers were out of america” poof wish granted.

The second guy goes “I wish all the spics and jews were gone too” poof wish granted.

So the genie turns to the third guy and says “now what is your wish”?
The guy guy says, “You mean to tell me there are no nigger, spics or jews anymore”
The genie says “yes”

So the guy turns and says, “Well I’ll have a coke then.”

Read full topic

item.title: Jokes
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“MidGuardian, post:5, topic:62751”]on a monkey island, a genie sent 3 men there. he laid a curse upon all three of them that if they said monkey they would die a dramatic death , so…
1st man goes “Hey look a monkey!” he died.
2nd man goes “I like monkeys!” he died.
3rd man goes “Phew, at least i didnt say Monkeys!” and he died.[/quote]
Not funny tbh…

Read full topic

item.title: Jokes
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

A man is in the desert and find a genies lamp, so he rubs it. The genie appears and grants him three wishes. The mans wishes are…

  1. I want to be surrounded by lots of women
  2. I want to be out of this desert
  3. I want an unlimited amount of water
    The genie grants his wishes by turning him into a toilet in the womens rest room.

Read full topic
